description:
COURSE LAST REVIEW: JANUARY 2016

JOIN 700 STUDENTS IN MY LIBREOFFICE COURSES!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LibreOffice is a powerful free suite, learn how to use it at best to make your documents look good and support modern open document formats.

Learn all you need to know to use LibreOffice to full advantage! You are going to see the different components of LibreOffice and a series of how-to guides.

Impress, the presentation application

You will see how to use Impress to create presentations, with text, images, data, diagrams and more. How to make them look great easily and help you get your point across. Learn all the tips you need to know to present your document in an effective way.

You'll also see how to format objects and create complex documents in case you use Impress to create documents on slides (slideuments).

You will get:

  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

I am adding new lectures and the price will soon go up from $25
title: Learn LibreOffice now, start using the Open suite: Impress
